name: oso
description: Impact measurement for open source software
author: Kariba Labs

scripts.copy: yarn copy:frontend && yarn copy:docs && yarn copy:html
scripts.copy:html: find build/ -name '*.html' -type f | grep -v index.html | sed s/\.html$// | xargs -I _ bash -c 'mkdir -p _ && cp -v _.html _/index.html'
scripts.deploy:site: turbo run build --filter=@opensource-observer/docs --filter=@opensource-observer/frontend && turbo run deploy --filter=@opensource-observer/frontend && yarn copy
scripts.test:integration: (docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml down || true) && docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml run --rm test
